name: cordova-plugin-ms-azure-mobile-engagement
description: Cordova plugin for Azure Mobile Engagement

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run jscs
scripts.jshint: node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint www && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint tests
scripts.jscs: node node_modules/jscs/bin/jscs www && node node_modules/jscs/bin/jscs tests

author: Olivier Goguel
